oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Solomon Bogart to his sister Martha regarding the USS Sultana disaster
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written on U. S. Christian Commission stationery and titled "Horid Disaster." On the back of the letter he writes "lost, lost, all is lost." This letter explains the death of Sol's brother-in-law, Henry Marshall Misemer and two brothers, Levi and Harrison Bogart, on the USS Sultana. He describes his own survival the Sultana and looking for Misemer and his brothers' bodies. He signs it, "Your Brother, Solomon Bogart, Death forget me not." See TSLA Mf. #2008.
